reviewText: This is a great series. Makes me seem so normal. It arrived sooner that expected and in good shape.

Seasons 1 - 4 worked like a charrm!!  Season 5 disks 1 & 3 would not work saysing "Disk error...."  Reported it to Amazon and they were replaced without a problem.  Disks 1 & 3 still would not work on replacement set disk 2 worked fine.  I don't know.....  So, I reordered Season 5 again separately and it worked fine.  Manufacturerer defect????  My DVD player is both Blu-Ray and the other.

I love this show, my husband got me hooked on about the middle of the third season, didn't always get to watch cause of work. Now I am excited to watch from day one. Once I see them all I will start collecting each and every season after. This is the on season set of a tv show I have ever ordered, thats how much I love this show
The boxes were broken, but the discs are fine.
Bought for a friend and hoping it will play in his laptop

"Shameless" may be one of the best TV series I've ever seen, and without a doubt, aside from the BBC's "Funland"(by some of folks who did The League of Gentlemen: The Complete Series 1, it's the most obscene TV show I've ever seen, but the show is really well-acted and -written. If you're able to handle nekkid people & foul language, give it a shot. Saying that, I paid about $40 for this 3-Season set from AmazonUK......people that charge prices like the ones that have this listed should be BANNED!
The wife is hooked. Okay, so I watch it too. Set was well packaged and complete.
Funny series. I liked how each season had own case unlike other series I bought. It was worth it
Bought seasons 1-5.new.came new and enjoyed the episodes very much.now I need to buy season 6 and 7.
It arrived a few days before it should have, which I have 0 problem with. The show is AMAZING, never a dull moment!

So happy hoe fast my order came and can't wait to sit down and watch these dvd's
And would also like to add how awesome the package was when it arrived  100% happy
